1	中文	\N	Zhōngwén	Chinese language	noun	\N	\N	现代汉语	Modern Chinese	\N	\N	\N	zhong1wen2.mp3	May refer to	1
2	繁体	繁體	fántǐ	traditional characters	noun	\N	\N	现代汉语	Modern Chinese	\N	\N	\N	\N	\N	2
3	中	\N	zhōng	in / amongst	preposition	\N	\N	现代汉语	Modern Chinese	\N	\N	\N	zhong1.mp3	a note	3
4	文	\N	wén	writing / language / culture	noun	\N	\N	现代汉语	Modern Chinese	\N	\N	\N	wen2.mp3	\N	4
5	繁	\N	fán	complicated / many	adjective	\N	\N	现代汉语	Modern Chinese	\N	\N	\N	fan2.mp3	\N	5
6	体	體	tǐ	body / form / style / system	noun	\N	\N	现代汉语	Modern Chinese	\N	\N	\N	ti3.mp3	\N	6
7	简	簡	jiǎn	simple	adjective	\N	\N	现代汉语	Modern Chinese	\N	\N	\N	jian3.mp3	\N	7
8	简体	簡體	jiǎntǐ	simplified characters	noun	\N	\N	现代汉语	Modern Chinese	\N	\N	\N	\N	\N	8
9	中	\N	Zhōng	China	proper noun	国家	Country	地方	Places	中国	China	\N	zhong1.mp3	\N	9
10	前	\N	qián	in front of / before	adjective	\N	\N	现代汉语	Modern Chinese	\N	\N	\N	qian2.mp3	\N	10
11	不见	不見	bùjiàn	to not see / to not meet	verb	\N	\N	现代汉语	Modern Chinese	\N	\N	\N	bu2jian4.mp3	\N	11
12	古人	\N	gǔrén	people from ancient times / the ancients / person who has passed away	noun	\N	\N	历史	History	\N	\N	\N	gu3ren2.mp3	\N	12
13	不	\N	bù	not / no	adverb	否定	Negation	现代汉语	Modern Chinese	\N	\N	\N	bu4.mp3	不 is used for simple negation, as opposed to 没, which is used for existence. The use is similar in both modern and literary Chinese. (Pulleyblank 1995, p. 103) For example, 不可，直不百步耳，是亦走也。'They 14 not do so. Though they did not run a hundred paces, yet they also ran away.' (Meng 1.3/1/26, translation by Legge)	13
15	见	見	jiàn	to see / to meet	verb	\N	\N	现代汉语	Modern Chinese	\N	\N	\N	jian4.mp3	Often used as a complement of result meaning to hear, to see, to meet, etc through that action.	14
16	古	\N	gǔ	ancient / old / palaeo-	adjective	\N	\N	现代汉语	Modern Chinese	\N	\N	\N	gu3.mp3	\N	15
17	人	\N	rén	person / people	noun	\N	\N	现代汉语	Modern Chinese	\N	\N	\N	ren2.mp3	\N	16
